name: Nortriptyline

dosing.notes: Better tolerated than amitriptyline. Serum level monitoring useful (target 50-150 ng/mL). Take at bedtime.

canadian_clinical.inpatient_strategy: Start 25 mg nocte. Titrate by 25 mg every 3-5 days. Target 75-150 mg.
canadian_clinical.outpatient_strategy: Start 10-25 mg nocte. Review in 2-4 weeks. Titrate slowly.

cautions.renal: No specific adjustment required; monitor closely.
cautions.hepatic: Reduce dose in hepatic impairment; use with caution.

warnings: Anticholinergic side effects (dry mouth, constipation, urinary retention)
Cardiovascular effects in overdose — high lethality
